item.title: Rubber Ducking
item.description: Yes, rubber duck debugging is really funny. The wiki, a dedicated site or coding horror explain it pretty well. It is a fantastic methodology because there is no other human to try and take advantage of your stupidity - implicitly (unconsciously) or explicitly (capitalism). Like media and technology which this world unconsciously loves and wants to be…. There is a shadow side. To me the story says something about doing programming in the bathtub with a computer.
